message:
Enable S3 block public access (AWS Security Best Practices): Enable S3 block public access settings on all S3 buckets to prevent public access at the account level. URL: [https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/access-control-block-public-access.html](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/access-control-block-public-access.html)

Enable VPC endpoint for S3 (AWS Security Best Practices): Create a VPC endpoint for S3 to ensure that S3 traffic does not leave the VPC and traverse the public internet. URL: [https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/vpc-endpoints-s3.html](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/vpc-endpoints-s3.html)

Enable S3 data events in AWS CloudTrail (CIS AWS Foundations): Enable S3 data events in AWS CloudTrail to capture detailed logs of data-level events for S3 buckets. URL: [https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/compliance/AWS_CIS_Foundations_Benchmark.pdf](https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/compliance/AWS_CIS_Foundations_Benchmark.pdf)

Enable S3 bucket replication (NIST Special Publication 800-53): Configure S3 bucket replication to replicate data to a different AWS Region for disaster recovery. URL: [https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf](https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf)

Enable Amazon S3 Inventory (CIS AWS Foundations): Enable Amazon S3 Inventory to generate regular reports on the objects within S3 buckets for auditing and compliance purposes. URL: [https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/compliance/AWS_CIS_Foundations_Benchmark.pdf](https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/compliance/AWS_CIS_Foundations_Benchmark.pdf)

Enable S3 bucket access logging (NIST Special Publication 800-53): Enable access logging for S3 buckets to capture detailed logs of all requests made to the bucket. URL: [https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf](https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf)

Enable S3 bucket event notifications (AWS Security Best Practices): Configure event notifications for S3 buckets to monitor specific events such as object creation, deletion, etc. URL: [https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/NotificationHowTo.html](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/NotificationHowTo.html)

Enable S3 bucket transfer acceleration (NIST Special Publication 800-53): Enable S3 bucket transfer acceleration to speed up data transfers to and from S3 buckets. URL: [https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf](https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf)

Restrict public access to S3 buckets (AWS Security Best Practices): Ensure that S3 bucket policies and access control lists (ACLs) are configured to deny public access. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/access-control-block-public-access.html

Enable access logging for S3 buckets (CIS AWS Foundations): Enable access logging for S3 buckets to capture detailed logs of all requests. URL: https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/compliance/AWS_CIS_Foundations_Benchmark.pdf

Enable versioning for S3 buckets (AWS Security Best Practices): Enable versioning for S3 buckets to protect against accidental deletion and to retain previous versions of objects. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/Versioning.html

Enable S3 bucket and object-level logging (NIST Special Publication 800-53): Enable CloudTrail logs for S3 buckets and configure logging for all S3 objects. URL: https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf

Enable server-side encryption using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) for S3 (CIS AWS Foundations): Enable server-side encryption for S3 using AWS KMS to ensure data at rest is encrypted. URL: https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/compliance/AWS_CIS_Foundations_Benchmark.pdf

Enable server-side encryption using AWS S3 Managed Keys (SSE-S3) for S3 (AWS Security Best Practices): Enable SSE-S3 for S3 buckets to automatically encrypt objects using AWS-managed keys. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/serv-side-encryption.html

Enable server-side encryption using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Master Keys (CMKs) for S3 (AWS Security Best Practices): Enable SSE-KMS for S3 buckets to encrypt objects using customer-managed CMKs. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/serv-side-encryption.html

Enable default encryption for S3 buckets (AWS Security Best Practices): Set up a default encryption configuration for S3 buckets to enforce encryption on all new objects. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/bucket-encryption.html

Enable S3 bucket access logging using Amazon CloudWatch (CIS AWS Foundations): Enable CloudWatch logging for S3 buckets to receive notifications about access events. URL: https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/compliance/AWS_CIS_Foundations_Benchmark.pdf

Enable S3 bucket event notifications (NIST Special Publication 800-53): Configure event notifications for S3 buckets to detect and respond to specific events. URL: https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf

Implement bucket policies for fine-grained access control (AWS Security Best Practices): Use bucket policies to define fine-grained access control for S3 buckets and objects. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/example-bucket-policies.html

Implement cross-region replication for S3 buckets (AWS Security Best Practices): Configure cross-region replication for S3 buckets to replicate data across multiple AWS regions for disaster recovery. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/crr.html

Enable block public access for S3 buckets (CIS AWS Foundations): Enable block public access settings for S3 buckets to prevent public access at the bucket level. URL: https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/compliance/AWS_CIS_Foundations_Benchmark.pdf

Enable S3 bucket inventory (AWS Security Best Practices): Enable S3 bucket inventory to generate regular reports on objects within a bucket for auditing and compliance. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/storage-inventory.html

Enable access denied event logging for S3 buckets (NIST Special Publication 800-53): Enable CloudTrail access denied event logging for S3 buckets to monitor unauthorized access attempts. URL: https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf

List security controls for Amazon S3 based on guidelines from CIS, NIST, AWS Security Best Practices, and STIGs. Use direct imperative commands, focusing on access management, encryption, monitoring, and network controls. For each control, include the specific source and a URL for direct access to additional details. Omit introductions, conclusions, comments, and warnings about content limitations.

Examples:

Implement the principle of least privilege for IAM permissions (AWS Security Best Practices): Ensure IAM policies for S3 are restricted to necessary operations. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/best-practices.html

Enable Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for object deletion (CIS AWS Foundations): Require multi-factor authentication to delete objects. URL: https://d0.awsstatic.com/whitepapers/compliance/AWS_CIS_Foundations_Benchmark.pdf

Enable server-side encryption for all objects stored in S3 (NIST Special Publication 800-53): Use AWS S3 SSE to protect data at rest. URL: https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf

Use policies to enforce encryption on upload (AWS Security Best Practices): Configure bucket policies to reject unencrypted object uploads. URL: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/using-iam-policies.html
